title.value: Оценка экономической эффективности доз и форм борсодержащих микроудобрений в посевах озимого рапса при разных уровнях азотного питания
Estimation of economic efficiency of boron-containing microfertilizers dozes and forms in winter rape crops at different levels of a nitrogen nutrition
Estimation of economic efficiency of boron-containing microfertilizers dozes and forms in winter rape crops at different levels of a nitrogen nutrition

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Chikalova, Zh.V., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)
Rak, M.V., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute for Soil Science and Agrochemistry

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented data on the results of researches for 2006-2009 of studying of influence of various doses (150, 300, 450, 600 g. d.v./hectares) and forms of boron microfertilizers (boric acid, Ecolist, Adob, EleGum) on productivity of oilseed of winter rape (Brassica napus), cultivated on two backgrounds of nitrogen nutrition (N160P90K150 and N200Р90К150), and also results of an estimation of economic efficiency of studied variants. It is established, that at entering under winter rape N160P90K150 from the agronomical and economic points of view the most effective dose of boron is B300 in the form of boric acid and В150 in the form of Ecolist, Adob and EleGum, at entering N200P90K150 – B450 in the form of boric acid and B300 in the form of Ecolist, Adob and EleGum. Greater level of nitrogen nutrition (N200) allows receiving higher productivity of oilseed of winter rape and provides the highest profitability of cultivation of the given crop.
